newsitem.title: UK: Halifax says Cazenove joint broker on float.
newsitem.headline: Halifax says Cazenove joint broker on float.

text.p: The Halifax Building Society said it has appointed Cazenove & Co as joint broker for its proposed conversion and stock market flotation later this year.
It said in a statement that Cazenove will work with Merrill Lynch which remains lead broker for the issue. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717.
